web.name: PHP
web.description: The main language I use within my job! I have gone from knowing nothing about PHP, to understanding it as well as MATLAB, my strongest programming language.

web.name: React
web.description: The language the website has been built in! I've taken multiple online courses in React and am learning more all of the time!

web.name: SQL
web.description: Another language used often within my job. Although I usually see SQL wrapped in CodeIgniter syntax, I have become proficient in using standard SQL when querying databases.

web.name: JavaScript
web.description: A language that I'm slowly coming to terms with, with the help of React. Often I use jQuery instead of pure Javascript (or a combination of the two).

other.name: MATLAB
other.description: The language used for my Dissertation! MATLAB was my go-to programming language of choice during my years studying Mathematics at university, so is one of my strongest programming languages.

other.name: C++
other.description: A language I studied during university, C++ introduced me to object based programming.

other.name: C#
other.description: I self-taught C# by redoing university assignments in this language, but have not looked at it very much recently!

other.name: Python
other.description: A language I've never formally 'learnt'. Whenever I have come across Python, I more-or-less follow along, and it is a programming language that I have in my sights on!

additional.name: GitHub
additional.description: Used briefly during my dissertation, I now use GitHub on a daily basis during my role as a Junior Software Developer.

additional.name: jQuery
additional.description: Arguable the syntax I had the most trouble understanding initially, I now am confident in using jQuery and much prefer it to regular JavaScript.

additional.name: CodeIgniter
additional.description: The Framework I work on in my job, I have developed an understanding of the framework and will continue to learn it in more detail I work closely with it.

additional.name: Laravel
additional.description: A Framework I'm very interested in learning, so I have started an online course in the latest version.

additional.name: LaTeX
additional.description: Used to write both my project and final-year dissertation at university, I became very fluent in using LaTeX. My preferred way to access it was the online editor Overleaf
